recommended_degree: Teknologi Informasi, Sistem Informasi, Ilmu Komputer (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Qualifications
- Diploma (D3) or Bachelor’s Degree (S1) in Informatics, Computer Science, Information Systems, Software Engineering, or a related field.
- Strong foundational understanding of programming concepts using JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, PHP, or Java.
- Basic knowledge of both frontend and backend technologies, including:
- Frontend: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React.js, Next.js, Vue.js, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js/Express.js, Laravel, Spring Boot, Django
- Familiarity with RESTful API concepts and basic API testing.
- Basic understanding of SQL queries and database management (MySQL, PostgreSQL).
- Ability to create clear and simple documentation (user flows, user stories, or technical notes).
- Familiar with WordPress or Headless CMS.
- Understanding of technical SEO (schema markup, meta tags, sitemap, redirects).
- Knowledge of page speed optimization (LCP, CLS, image compression, caching).
- Ability to set up and debug GTM, GA4, Meta Pixel, and event tracking.
- Understanding of server-side tracking (Meta CAPI, GA4 Server-Side).

Responsibilities
- Contribute to fullstack development tasks by writing clean, maintainable code for both frontend and backend components under the guidance of senior engineers.
- Assist in implementing new features, improving existing functionalities, and ensuring seamless integration between frontend and backend systems.
- Support debugging, troubleshooting, and testing processes to ensure reliability, performance, and overall quality of the application.
- Perform basic API testing and utilize SQL queries for data validation or analysis when needed.
- Collaborate with the team to clarify requirements, propose technical solutions, and ensure alignment with project goals.
- Assist in preparing and maintaining documentation such as user stories, user flows, technical notes, and development progress updates.
- Participate in daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, retrospectives, and other Agile routines.
- Build landing pages quickly (within ≤48 hours) as required.
- Configure, implement, and debug GTM/GA4/Meta Pixel setups and event tracking.
- Optimize page performance, including LCP, CLS, image optimization, and caching.
- Support API integrations (Meta API, WhatsApp API, CRM API).
- Develop automation workflows such as lead scoring, routing, and webhook setups.
- Assist with basic DevOps tasks, including Docker and CI/CD pipelines..
